body_html:
Not sure I got every detail (my brain is already a bit melted today) - but my ➕ on displaying the years in order and rephrasing the text on the button 👍

I would however prefer this in a separate PR, so that we don't have this one linger around forever with the efforts of constantly keeping it up to date 😉

So, if you address my previous comment about 👾 , we could merge this one and do the naming and sorting in a separate one @mbrien12 .

body:
Not sure I got every detail (my brain is already a bit melted today) - but my ➕  on displaying the years in order and rephrasing the text on the button 👍 

I would however prefer this in a separate PR, so that we don't have this one linger around forever with the efforts of constantly keeping it up to date 😉 

So, if you address [my previous comment about 👾 ](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/pull/877#discussion_r155032510), we could merge this one and do the naming and sorting in a separate one @mbrien12 .
